We work every day on Formacar!- Added a new navigation menu that can be customized.- Added new registration / authorization methods via Apple ID and Google.- Now you can link all your social networks to your account for easy authorization.- Added stickers section in 3D Configurator version 2.0. - 3D Configurator adds information for cars, tuning and disks.
- In the 3D Configurator version 2.0, different interior color palettes have been added to the car interior painting section.
- Improved stability and fixed some bugs.
PS. You can send your comments and suggestions to support@formacar.ru
